A1.description: Question 1 response in the Autism Spectrum Quotient (AQ-10) test

A2.description: Question 2 response in the AQ-10 test

A3.description: Question 3 response in the AQ-10 test

A4.description: Question 4 response in the AQ-10 test

A5.description: Question 5 response in the AQ-10 test

A6.description: Question 6 response in the AQ-10 test

A7.description: Question 7 response in the AQ-10 test

A8.description: Question 8 response in the AQ-10 test

A9.description: Question 9 response in the AQ-10 test

A10_Autism_Spectrum_Quotient.description: Total score of the AQ-10 test

Age_Years.description: Age of the participant in years

Jaundice.description: Whether the participant had jaundice as a baby

value_dict.No: The participant did not have jaundice as a baby
value_dict.Yes: The participant had jaundice as a baby

Family_mem_with_ASD.description: Whether the participant has a family member with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)

value_dict.No: The participant does not have a family member with ASD
value_dict.Yes: The participant has a family member with ASD

value_dict.Self: The participant completed the test themselves
value_dict.Parent: A parent of the participant completed the test
value_dict.Family Member: A family member of the participant completed the test
value_dict.Relative: A relative of the participant completed the test
value_dict.Health Care Professional: A health care professional completed the test
value_dict.School and NGO: A school or NGO completed the test

ASD_traits.description: Whether the participant has traits of ASD

value_dict.No: The participant does not have traits of ASD
value_dict.Yes: The participant has traits of ASD

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting Autism Spectrum Disorder traits.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the participant, please predict if the participant has traits of ASD.

class_value_dict.No: The participant does not have traits of ASD
class_value_dict.Yes: The participant has traits of ASD

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting Autism Spectrum Disorder in family members.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the participant, please predict if the participant has a family member with ASD.

class_value_dict.No: The participant does not have a family member with ASD
class_value_dict.Yes: The participant has a family member with ASD

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting gender.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the participant, please predict the gender of the participant.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting age.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the participant, please predict the age of the participant.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting the history of jaundice.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the participant, please predict if the participant had jaundice as a baby.

class_value_dict.No: The participant did not have jaundice as a baby
class_value_dict.Yes: The participant had jaundice as a baby
